BALL.name: AniBalls
BALL.description:
AniBalls boost your chances to capture any Animon,
from basic to legendary!

ENCOUNTER.name: Encounter Tokens
ENCOUNTER.description:
These tokens grant you additional chances to
encounter wild Animons.

CONSUMABLE.name: Sweets
CONSUMABLE.description:
Give your Animon a treat! Use these items to boost
their stats, heal them or unlock various effects!

BOX.name: Spellbooks
BOX.description:
Spellbooks contain random moves that can be
taught to your Animons!

MOVES.name: Moves
MOVES.description: Teach your Animon new moves to make them stronger!

FRAGMENT.name: Crystals
FRAGMENT.description:
Mystical items brimming with arcane energy, used
to elevate your Animons' ascension.
